1|None|Long File|gitmetrics.metrics.change_proneness|../test_projects/gitmetrics/gitmetrics/metrics/change_proneness.py|Broad file size (357 LOC) with low maintainability index, affecting three complex metric functions, high propagation risk
2|None|Long Method|calculate_change_proneness|../test_projects/gitmetrics/gitmetrics/metrics/change_proneness.py:163|144-line method, high cyclomatic complexity (34), monolithic logic hinders comprehension and tests
3|None|Feature Envy|calculate_change_proneness|../test_projects/gitmetrics/gitmetrics/metrics/change_proneness.py:163|10 diff calls, low cohesion and heavy external API dependency
